long_description: Burton Ion all-mountain snowboard boots feature top-of-the-line features: canted cushioning, firm tongues, and liners that conform to your feet. Pirelli rubber soles grip slick surfaces with ease. Shrinkage(TM) technology reduces boot's overall footprint by 1 full size, minimizing boot overhang, bulk and weight. Boots have outer shell pressure-relief panels; gel cushioning is fused to area where ankle straps rest on boots to evenly distribute pressure when bindings are cranked tight. Powerful, seamless backstay spines increase medial/lateral support, edge-to-edge response and durability. Imprint(TM) 4 liners feature DRYRIDE moisture-wicking technology to keep feet comfortable; Rad Pads add comfort. Snowproof internal gussets on boot tongues completely seal lower boot zones to keep feet warm and dry. Firm-flexing, thin-profile, 3D molded tongues wrap the shins, ankles and insteps in comfort, offer a seamless flex and reduce performance-robbing shell/liner stack-up. Streamlined Speed Zone(TM) shell lacing lets you fine-tune the upper and lower zones in seconds; this system offers powerful rebound, wrap and response with minimal effort. Low-profile EST(TM) midsoles with a reduced ramp angle lower your center of gravity for improved boot feel; ultra-damping B3 gel inserts cushion without weight. Molded EVA footbeds with a supportive shank and dual-density cushioning lessen the blow of hardpack landings; antimicrobial coating fights odors. Cushioned EVA platforms are fused to the liner's footprint; Pirelli(TM) rubber outsoles mimic snow tires to give you the ultimate grip on snow and ice.
